Attribute.Name: Strength
Attribute.Description: Strength is a measure of a creatures power. The stronger a being is, the more they can carry and the more damage they can inflict in hand to hand combat.

Attribute.Name: Vitality
Attribute.Description: Vitality is a measure of a creatures toughness and fitness. The tougher a being is relates to how many HP the creature has and how much resistance to physical attacks it possesses.

Attribute.Name: Dexterity
Attribute.Description: Dexterity is a measure of grace and finesse. Dexterity relates to dodging and avoiding damage and performing many rogue-like skills.

Attribute.Name: Speed
Attribute.Description: Speed is a measure of how quick a creature is. Speed relates to how fast a creature can move and how many attacks it can make.

Attribute.Name: Intelligence
Attribute.Description: Intelligence is a measure of a creatures knowledge and reasoning ability. Intelligence affects many types of magic use and knowledge based skills.

Attribute.Name: Wisdom
Attribute.Description: Wisdom is a measure of a creatures ability to empathize with others and understand different points of view. Wisdom affects the magical abilities of divine-based spellcasting classes.

Attribute.Name: Charisma
Attribute.Description: Charisma is a measure of a creatures likability and ability to influence others through speech or through their presence.

Attribute.Name: Virtue
Attribute.Description: Virtue is a measure of a creatures moral compass. Beings with negative virtue are evil while positive virtue is a sign of a good heart.

Attribute.Name: Luck
Attribute.Description: Luck is an intangible factor that affects many actions a creature can take. Luck though can be capricious.

Attribute.Name: Sex
Attribute.Description: A creature's sex - for playable characters male or female, some monster races are asexual.

Attribute.Name: HP
Attribute.Description: Health points are a measure of a beings lifeforce, how much damage they can sustain before dying.

Attribute.Name: SP
Attribute.Description: Stamina points are a measure of a beings physical fitness and determines the quantity of actions a being can take before getting tired.

Attribute.Name: MP
Attribute.Description: Magic points are a measure of a beings magical power reserves. Spellcasting requires a reserve of magic points.

Attribute.Name: HP Regenerary
Attribute.Description: Regeneration rate for health points.

Attribute.Name: SP Regeneration
Attribute.Description: Regeneration rate for stamina points.

Attribute.Name: MP Regenertation
Attribute.Description: Regeneration rate for magic points.

Attribute.Name: To Hit
Attribute.Description: Attack / to hit is the measure of how likely it is to hit another creature.

Attribute.Name: Armor Class
Attribute.Description: Armor class is a measure of how hard it is to hit a creature.

Attribute.Name: Initiative
Attribute.Description: Initiative is a creatures speed in combat, determining when and how often they attack.

Attribute.Name: Attack Bonus
Attribute.Description: How good a creature is at attacking in combat.

Attribute.Name: Experience Points
Attribute.Description: The amount of experience points the character has.

Attribute.Name: Experience Gain
Attribute.Description: The rate at which the character gains experience. A value of 2 means they get experience 2% faster than regular.

Attribute.Name: Weight Allowance
Attribute.Description: Amount of weight in pounds a character can carry.

Attribute.Name: Fortitude
Attribute.Description: Fortitude / toughness saving throw for resisting disease, poison etc.

Attribute.Name: Reflexes
Attribute.Description: Reflexes/dodging saving throw out of the way of spells and traps desc

Attribute.Name: Willpower
Attribute.Description: Willpower saving throw to resist spells and special abilities.

Attribute.Name: Slashing
Attribute.Description: Resist slashing damage.

Attribute.Name: Blunt
Attribute.Description: Resist blunt damage.

Attribute.Name: Piercing
Attribute.Description: Resist piercing damage.

Attribute.Name: Silver Weapons
Attribute.Description: Resist damage from silver weapons. Most characters have 0 for this value, some races are weak against it.

Attribute.Name: Energy
Attribute.Description: Resist magical energy damage.

Attribute.Name: Fire
Attribute.Description: Resist fire damage.

Attribute.Name: Water
Attribute.Description: Resist water damage.

Attribute.Name: Ice
Attribute.Description: Resist ice (water energy) damage.

Attribute.Name: Acid
Attribute.Description: Resist acid (earth energy) damage.

Attribute.Name: Lightning
Attribute.Description: Resist lightning (air energy) damage.

Attribute.Name: Holy
Attribute.Description: Resist holy damage.

Attribute.Name: Unholy
Attribute.Description: Resist unholy damage.

Attribute.Name: Poison
Attribute.Description: Resist poison damage.
